segments.text: I'm starving ! It would be truly appreciated if you bought me a burrito .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm a little short . I don't have enough for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm starving , as I didn't eat yet today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really don't have enough money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , why don't you ask Bob for some money ? I'm hungry too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be getting money on Friday , and I'll get it back to you then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , so on Friday , you can buy yourself something to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can always go home and make something to eat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't go home yet , because I have things to do here .
segments.speaker: S1
